Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-43398 affecting package rubygem-rexml for versions less than 3.3.9-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-43398 affecting package rubygem-rexml for versions less than 3.3.9-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package rubygem-rexml is earlier than 3.3.9-1, affected by CVE-2024-43398
